titleStmt.title: A trick to catch the old-one As it hath beene lately acted, by the children of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Eld, and are to be sold at his house in Fleet-lane at the signe of the Printers-presse,
